Undead: Skill Trained (Intimidation; Religion)
Assurance (Piloting Lore): Can take an automatic 32 on Piloting Lore checks
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Group Aid: (F) After Aiding an ally, Aids another on the same skill
Improvised Repair: Can quickly repair a broken item into shoddy condition
Lengthy Diversion: Can remain hidden after a Create A Diversion attempt critically succeeds
Lie To Me: Can use Deception to detect lies in a conversation
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict off-balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Tap Into Blood (Arcane): (1) Uses Arcana in place of the associated skill for a Recall Knowledge check while benefiting from blood magic
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity (5 max); expert) Class DC: Sorcerer: 36 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (+28 1d4+3 P/S R10'; dexterity; expert); Gauntlet (+27 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Mace (+27 1d6+3 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Lesser Alchemist's Fire): Weapon Familiarity (Lesser Alchemist's Fire)
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Bespell Strikes: (F) Casting a non-cantrip spell causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of the turn once per turn; the damage type is force or the same type as the spell inflicted
Tap Into Blood (Divine): (1) Steps or Repositions a target using Religion for the check while benefiting from blood magic
Tap Into Blood (Occult): (1) Takes a 10' Step while benefiting from blood magic
Tap Into Blood (Primal): (1) Uses Nature for a Demoralize check while benefiting from blood magic
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Majestic Will: Save Master (Will)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Bloodline Resistance: +1 vs. spells and magical effects
Cat Fall: Suffers 10' less damage from falling
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Majestic Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: A10: 2; A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; A6: 4; A7: 4; A8: 4; A9: 4; AC1: 5; D10: 2; D1: 4; D2: 4; D3: 4; D4: 4; D5: 4; D6: 4; D7: 4; D8: 4; D9: 5; DC1: 5; O10: 2; O1: 4; O2: 4; O3: 4; O4: 4; O5: 4; O6: 4; O7: 4; O8: 4; O9: 4; OC1: 5; P10: 2; P1: 4; P2: 4; P3: 4; P4: 4; P5: 4; P6: 4; P7: 4; P8: 4; P9: 5; PC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Arcane: +32 (charisma; legendary); Divine: +32 (charisma; legendary); Occult: +32 (charisma; legendary); Primal: +32 (charisma; legendary) Spell DC: Arcane: 42 (charisma; legendary); Divine: 42 (charisma; legendary); Occult: 42 (charisma; legendary); Primal: 42 (charisma; legendary)
Spells:
Aberrant Whispers (O3 Foc): (1) 5' emanation (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' emanation) inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts confused) (heightened +3 increases the radius by 5')
Ancestral Memories (A1 Foc): (1) R60' Self gains +1 on the next spell attack or target suffers -1 on its next save before the end of the turn (heightened 5th gives or inflicts +2 or -2; 8th gives or inflicts +3 or -3)
Angelic Halo (D1 Foc): (1) 15' emanation increases the HP restored by Heal by double the Heal spell's rank for 1 min
Angelic Wings (D3 Foc): (2) Self gains a 25' fly Speed and shines a 30' radius bright light for 3 rd (heightened 5th effects last for 1 min)
Arcane Countermeasure (A5 Foc): (R) R120' Reduces the triggering spell's heightened rank by 1 and gives the spell's targets +2 saves, skill checks, Armor Class, and DC against it
Celestial Brand (D5 Foc): (1) R30' Self and allies gain +1 attacks and skill checks vs. the unholy target, and attacks by holy creatures inflict +1d4 HP spirit, for 1 rd (heightened +2 holy creature attacks inflict +1 HP)
Chthonian Wrath (D5 Foc): (2) 60' cone inflicts 4d6 HP each of a random pair of damage types: bludgeoning and electricity; acid and slashing; bludgeoning and cold; fire and piercing (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP each)
Diabolic Edict (D1 Foc): (1) R30' Willing target performs a stated task, gaining +1 attack and skill checks, for 1 rd; refusal inflicts -1 attack and skill checks for 1 rd
Dispel Magic (A2): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dragon Breath (A3 Foc): (2) 30' cone inflicts 5d6 HP bludgeoning (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Dragon Wings (A5 Foc): (2) Self gains a 60' fly Speed for 1 min (heightened 8th effects last for 10 min)
Drain Life (D3 Foc): (1) R30' Target suffers 3d4 HP negative, and self gains equal temporary HP for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Elemental Blast (P5 Foc): (2) Choice of 30' cone, 60' line, or R30' 10' burst inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Elemental Motion (P3 Foc): (2) Self gains a 25' climb Speed for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +10' Speed; 9th gives +20' Speed)
Elemental Toss (P1 Foc): (1) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d8 HP bludgeoning, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Embrace The Pit (D3 Foc): (1) Self gains resistance 5 to fire and poison, resistance 1 to non-silver physical damage for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +5 resistance to fire and poison, +2 resistance to non-silver physical damage, and +5 weakness to good)
Extend Blood Magic (A3 Foc): (1) Extends the blood magic effect from a subsequent spell by 1 rd
Faerie Dust (P1 Foc): (1) R30' 5' burst (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' burst) inflicts loss of reactions and -2 Perception and Will for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure also inflicts -1 Perception and Will for 1 min) (heightened +3 increases the radius by 5')
Fey Disappearance (P3 Foc): (1) Self becomes invisible and moves normally over natural difficult terrain until the end of the next turn; performing a hostile action ends the spell (heightened 5th a hostile action does not end the spell)
Fey Glamour (P5 Foc): (2) R30' 30' burst disguises an area or 10 targets for 10 min
Flurry Of Claws (A1 Foc): (2) R30' Successful spell attack inflicts 1d8 HP slashing plus 1d4 HP force on 2 targets within 10' of each other (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP slashing and +1d4 HP additional)
Flurry Of Claws (D1 Foc): (2) R30' Successful spell attack inflicts 1d8 HP slashing plus 1d4 HP spirit on 2 targets within 10' of each other (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP slashing and +1d4 HP additional)
Flurry Of Claws (O1 Foc): (2) R30' Successful spell attack inflicts 1d8 HP slashing plus 1d4 HP mental on 2 targets within 10' of each other (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP slashing and +1d4 HP additional)
Flurry Of Claws (P1 Foc): (2) R30' Successful spell attack inflicts 1d8 HP slashing plus 1d4 HP fire on 2 targets within 10' of each other (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP slashing and +1d4 HP additional)
Glutton's Jaws (D1 Foc): (2) Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP piercing, giving self 1d4 temporary HP for 1 rd (heightened +2 inflicts +2d6 HP and gives +1d4 temporary HP)
Grasping Grave (D5 Foc): (2) R60' 20' radius inflicts 6d6 HP slashing and -10' Speed for 1 rd for 10 min (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and immobilized for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Hellfire Plume (D5 Foc): (2) R60' 10' radius inflicts 4d6 HP fire and 4d6 HP spirit (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP fire and spirit)
Horrific Visage (O1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, drained 1, or stupefied 1, based on the target's highest ability modifier, until the target saves or for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts condition level 2)
Jealous Hex (O1 Foc): (1) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 1, clumsy 1, drained 1, or stupefied 1, based on the target's highest ability modifier, until the target saves or for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts condition level 2)
Swamp Of Sloth (D3 Foc): (1) R120' 5' burst (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' burst) inflicts difficult terrain and 1d6 HP poison for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +2 increases radius by 5' and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Tentacular Limbs (O1 Foc): (1) Extends reach for touch spells and unarmed Strikes to 10' for 1 min; adding an action to touch spells extends reach to 20' (heightened +2 adding an action gives +10' touch spell reach)
Undeath's Blessing (D1 Foc): (1) Touched responds to Heal and Harm as an undead for 1 min, and Harm restores +2 Hit Points (save Will Heal and Harm have half effect for 1 rd; critical success negates) (heightened +1 Harm restores +2 Hit Points)
Unusual Anatomy (O3 Foc): (1) 5' emanation (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' emanation) inflicts stupefied 2 (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts confused) (heightened +3 increases the radius by 5')
You're Mine (O5 Foc): (2) R30' Inflicts stunned 1 for 1 rd and allows self to direct 1 target action (save Will inflicts stunned only; critical success negates; critical failure gives control for 1 rd) (heightened 7th gives control for 1 rd; critical failure gives control for 1 min or until the target succeeds on a save at the end of each turn)

Aberrant: Blood magic effect gives self +2 or a target -1 Will saves for 1 rd
Angelic: Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 saves for 1 rd
Anoint Ally: (1) Allows transferring blood magic effects to a chosen ally for 1 min
Arcane Evolution: Can learn 1 additional spell from spellbook each day, treating it as a signature spell if it is in repertoire
Bleed Out: (1) Immediately after gaining a blood magic effect, a successful R60' ranged spell attack also inflicts persistent bleed damage equal to the rank of the prior spell
Blood Ascendancy: Blood Rising can invoke 2 blood magic effects
Blood Rising: (R) Triggering casting by another of an occult; divine; arcane; primal spell targeting self invokes a blood magic effect that targets self or the caster
Blood Sovereignty: When casting a bloodline or sorcerous gift spell, can suffer Hit Point loss equal to twice the spell rank to gain 2 blood magic effects
Bloodline Conduit: (1) Subsequent casting of an instantaneous spell of up to 5th rank does not expend a spell slot once per min
Bloodline Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Bloodline Spells: Casting a bloodline or sorcerous gift spell invokes a blood magic effect
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Crossblooded Evolution (Aberrant): Blood magic effect gives self +2 or a target -1 Will saves for 1 rd
Crossblooded Evolution (Angelic): Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 saves for 1 rd
Crossblooded Evolution (Demonic): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts -1 Armor Class on a target for 1 rd
Crossblooded Evolution (Diabolic): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Deception for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP fire per spell rank on a target
Crossblooded Evolution (Draconic): Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Crossblooded Evolution (Elemental (Air)): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP slashing per spell rank on a target
Crossblooded Evolution (Elemental (Earth)): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning per spell rank on a target
Crossblooded Evolution (Elemental (Fire)): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP fire per spell rank on a target
Crossblooded Evolution (Elemental (Metal)): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP piercing per spell rank on a target
Crossblooded Evolution (Elemental (Water)): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning per spell rank on a target
Crossblooded Evolution (Elemental (Wood)): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning per spell rank on a target
Crossblooded Evolution (Fey): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Performance or concealment for 1 rd
Crossblooded Evolution (Hag): Blood magic effect inflicts 4 HP mental per spell rank (save basic Will) on the first successful attacker before the end of the next turn; if no attacks succeed, gives self temporary Hit Points equal to the spell rank until the beginning of the following turn
Crossblooded Evolution (Imperial): Blood magic effect gives self +1 Armor Class or +1 skill checks for 1 rd
Crossblooded Evolution (Undead): Blood magic effect gives self 1 temporary HP per spell rank until the start of the next turn or inflicts 1 HP void per spell rank on a target
Demonic: Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts -1 Armor Class on a target for 1 rd
Diabolic: Blood magic effect gives self +2 Deception for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP fire per spell rank on a target
Diverting Vortex: (1) Immediately after casting a non-cantrip spell, gains +1 Armor Class vs. ranged weapons until the start of the next turn
Draconic (Arcane): Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Draconic (Divine): Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Draconic (Occult): Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Draconic (Primal): Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Echoing Spell: (1) Casts a subsequent instantaneous spell of up to 4th rank a second time before the end of the next turn without using another spell slot
Effortless Concentration: (F) Sustains an active spell
Elemental (Air): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP slashing per spell rank on a target
Elemental (Earth): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning per spell rank on a target
Elemental (Fire): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP fire per spell rank on a target
Elemental (Metal): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP piercing per spell rank on a target
Elemental (Water): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning per spell rank on a target
Elemental (Wood): Blood magic effect gives self +2 Intimidation for 1 rd or inflicts 1 HP bludgeoning per spell rank on a target
Energy Fusion: (1) Expends 2 spell slots to increase a subsequent spell's energy damage by another spell's rank; the total damage is split evenly between the energy types inflicted by the 2 spells
Energy Ward: (F) Immediately after casting a non-cantrip energy damage spell, gains resistance equal to 4 + the spell rank to a choice of energy until the start of the next turn once per turn
Explosion Of Power: Blood magic effect inflicts 1d6 HP force per spell rank (save basic Reflex) in a 5' emanation
Fey: Blood magic effect gives self +2 Performance or concealment for 1 rd
Greater Crossblooded Evolution: Adds 3 sorcerous gift spells from a secondary bloodline, heightened to maximum rank, to spell repertoire
Greater Mental Evolution: Adds 1 spell of each rank to repertoire
Greater Physical Evolution: Can expend a spell slot to cast a common polymorph battle form spell as a signature spell once per day
Greater Spiritual Evolution: Spells have ghost touch effects
Greater Vital Evolution: Can cast 2 additional spells of different ranks after spell slots in each rank are exhausted once per day
Hag: Blood magic effect inflicts 4 HP mental per spell rank (save basic Will) on the first successful attacker before the end of the next turn; if no attacks succeed, gives self temporary Hit Points equal to the spell rank until the beginning of the following turn
Imperial: Blood magic effect gives self +1 Armor Class or +1 skill checks for 1 rd
Interweave Dispel: (1) Expends a spell slot to add Dispel Magic effects to a successful subsequent single-target spell
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-rank Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-rank during Seek
Occult Evolution: Can spend 1 min to add an unknown mental occult spell to repertoire until next daily prep once per day
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to energy
Propelling Sorcery: Blood magic effect allows Stepping as a free action or moving a target 5'
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of rank 7 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Reflect Harm: Blood magic effect allows responding with a spell attack to the first spell damage suffered by self before the start of the next turn; success inflicts equal damage on the caster, or twice the damage with a critical hit
Safeguard Spell: (1) Subsequent area spell does not affect self
Scintillating Spell: (1) Targets that fail a Reflex save vs. a subsequent instantaneous non-darkness spell also suffer dazzled for 1 rd, or blinded for 1 rd on a critical failure
Signature Spell Expansion: Has 2 additional signature spells of up to 3rd rank
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Sorcerer Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult; divine; arcane; primal tradition
Sorcerous Potency: Initial damage or healing from spell slots inflicts or restores additional Hit Points equal to the spell's rank
Spell Relay: (R) Allows an ally to cast the triggering spell with self as the origin
Spell Shroud: (1) Subsequent spell cast on self creates a 15' emanation that conceals creatures until the start of the next turn
Spellshape Mastery: Can use 1-action spellshape effects as free actions
Split Shot: (1) Adds a second target, inflicting half the initial damage, to a single-target instantaneous attack spell
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Terraforming Trickery: (1) Blood magic effect creates or removes difficult terrain in adjacent squares
Undead: Blood magic effect gives self 1 temporary HP per spell rank until the start of the next turn or inflicts 1 HP void per spell rank on a target
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
